pages.text: $(bgreen)Cob Cannon$() went to Harvard. He practices law in a prestigious New York firm. He can explode whole areas of zombies with a single corn launch. All this is common knowledge. But deep inside, what really makes him tick ?$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)500$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Very Slow$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant, that can shoot a $(bred)cannon$() to deal explosion damage in $(l)4 blocks$().

$(bpurple)Special :$() It can auto attack when its $(bred)second cannon$() is ready, or it can shoot when its owner asked. Right click it with empty hand to $(bred)ride on it$(), and perform attack when riding on it.$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() Shoot several Cob Cannons to surrounding.
